title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery tomato-based gravy.

title: French Onion Soup
summary: A rich soup of caramelized onions and beef stock, topped with a cheese-covered crouton.
